title: Confirm existence of MLB.com logo
custom_expected:
THEN a MLB.com logo is displayed in the upper left of the page
AND
logo clicks through to https://www.mlb.com/

title: Confirm existence of Team Page title
custom_expected: THEN "THE OFFICIAL SITE OF THE NEW YORK YANKEES" is displayed at the top of the page

custom_expected:
THEN NEWS is displayed in the navigation
AND
clicks through to http://m.mlb.com/nyy/news/

custom_expected:

title: Confirm existence of SEARCH icon
custom_expected: THEN a "Search" icon is present in the upper right of the page

title: Search team
custom_steps:
WHEN clicking the "Search" icon 
AND
typing YANKEES in the search box
custom_expected:
THEN the YANKEES team is returned
AND 
clicks through to https://www.mlb.com/yankees

title: Search active player
custom_steps:
WHEN clicking the "Search" icon 
AND
typing FREEMAN in the search box
custom_expected:
THEN the result set includes Freddie Freeman
AND
clicks through to http://m.mlb.com/player/518692/freddie-freeman

title: Confirm headshot for active player
custom_steps:
WHEN clicking the "Search" icon 
AND
typing FREEMAN in the search box
custom_expected:
THEN the result set includes Freddie Freeman
AND
URL is https://content.mlb.com/images/headshots/current/60x60/518692.png

title: Search inactive player
custom_steps:
WHEN clicking the "Search" icon 
AND
typing JETER in the search box
custom_expected:
THEN the result set includes Derek Jeter
AND
clicks through to http://m.mlb.com/player/116539/derek-jeter

title: Confirm silhouette for inactive player
custom_steps:
WHEN clicking the "Search" icon 
AND
typing JETER in the search box
custom_expected:
THEN the result set includes Derek Jeter
AND
URL is https://content.mlb.com/images/players/silhouettes/74x74/anon.png

title: "See All Results" clicks through to site search
custom_steps:
WHEN clicking the "Search" icon 
AND
typing BIRD in the search box
custom_expected: THEN clicking on "See all results" displays results at http://m.mlb.com/search#q=bird

title: "See All Results" with press of "Enter" displays site search
custom_steps:
WHEN clicking the "Search" icon 
AND
typing BIRD in the search box
custom_expected: THEN pressing "ENTER" displays results at http://m.mlb.com/search#q=bird

title: Confirm existence of ACCOUNT icon
custom_expected: THEN an "Account" icon is present in the upper right of the page

title: Confirm click to login page
custom_steps: WHEN clicking the "Account" icon on the page
custom_expected: THEN the login page is displayed at https://securea.mlb.com/enterworkflow.do?flowId=registration.connect.wizard&c_id=mlb&template=mobile&forwardUrl=https://www.mlb.com/yankees

title: Confirm megamenu at 1200px+
custom_expected: THEN hovering over "NEWS" in the navigation will open the megamenu and display "IN THIS SECTION."

title: Confirm sections+arrow at 568 - 1199px
custom_expected: THEN "SECTIONS" will display on the left with a dropdown arrow next to it and expanding will display "NEWS"

title: Confirm arrow at 320-567px
custom_expected: THEN a dropdown arrow will display on the left and expanding will display "NEWS"

title: Confirm MIG is present
custom_expected: THEN the MIG is displayed

title: Confirm "Prev Game" button shows yesterday's game
custom_expected:
THEN game data is displayed in the MIG
*Note: Game may be from a previous day OR earlier game of a double-header

title: Confirm "Next Game" button shows tomorrow's game
custom_expected:
THEN game data is displayed in the MIG
*Note: Game may be from the following day OR second game of a double-header

title: Auto-rotates (10 seconds)
custom_expected: THEN the media wall will rotate panels approximately every 10 seconds

title: Crawl through panels for 404/broken images
custom_expected: THEN the media will will not display any broken panels or links

title: Confirm nav arrow click
custom_steps: WHEN clicking the arrow to the left and right of the media wall
custom_expected: THEN the panels rotate as expected with each click

title: Confirm swipe functionality
custom_steps: WHEN swiping to the left and right of the media wall
custom_expected: THEN the panels rotate as expected with each swipe

title: Confirm click of page dots
custom_steps: WHEN tapping the dots below each media wall panel
custom_expected: THEN the media wall advances to the appropriate panel

title: Confirm presence of media (video, cut 4, news)
custom_expected:
THEN the mixed feed will display at least one of the following:
Video, Cut4, News

title: Confirm presence of component
custom_expected: THEN "Latest News" will be displayed on the page

title: Confirm presence of article
custom_expected: THEN at least one article will be displayed under "Latest News."

title: Confirm presence of component
custom_expected: THEN "Follow the Yankees" is displayed on the page

title: Confirm Facebook
custom_steps: WHEN clicking the "Facebook" icon under "Follow the Yankees"
custom_expected: THEN https://www.facebook.com/Yankees

title: Confirm Twitter
custom_steps: WHEN clicking the "Twitter" icon under "Follow the Yankees"
custom_expected: THEN https://twitter.com/Yankees loads

title: Confirm Instagram
custom_steps: WHEN clicking the "Instagram" icon under "Follow the Yankees"
custom_expected: THEN https://www.instagram.com/yankees loads

title: Confirm Snapchat
custom_steps: WHEN clicking the "Snapchat" icon under "Follow the Yankees"
custom_expected: THEN https://www.snapchat.com/add/Yankees loads

title: Confirm presence
custom_expected: THEN "Standings" is displayed on the page

title: Confirm league toggle
custom_steps:
WHEN clicking "American League" 
OR
clicking "National League"
custom_expected:
THEN the correct teams are displayed.

AL EAST: BAL/NYY/BOS/TB/TOR
AL CENTRAL: CLE/MIN/DET/CWS/KC
AL WEST: HOU/LAA/SEA/OAK/TEX

NL EAST: WSH/NYM/PHI/MIA/ATL
NL CENTRAL: STL/CIN/CHC/MIL/PIT
NL WEST: COL/LAD/ARI/SD/SF

title: Confirm division toggle
custom_expected:
THEN the correct teams are displayed.

AL EAST: BAL/NYY/BOS/TB/TOR
AL CENTRAL: CLE/MIN/DET/CWS/KC
AL WEST: HOU/LAA/SEA/OAK/TEX

NL EAST: WSH/NYM/PHI/MIA/ATL
NL CENTRAL: STL/CIN/CHC/MIL/PIT
NL WEST: COL/LAD/ARI/SD/SF

title: Confirm "Full Standings" links to desktop link on desktop
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Full Standings" from a desktop browser
custom_expected: THEN http://mlb.mlb.com/mlb/standings/index.jsp?c_id=nyy is loaded

title: Confirm "Full Standings" links to mobile link on phone
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Full Standings" from a mobile device
custom_expected: THEN http://m.mlb.com/nyy/standings is loaded

title: Confirm presence
custom_expected: THEN "Team Leaders" is displayed on the page

title: Confirm headshot presence
custom_expected: THEN "Team Leader" players are displaying headshots

title: Confirm batting/pitching toggle
custom_expected:
THEN the data changes as expected between batting stats (ex: AVG/HR/RBI/SB) or pitching stats (W/SV/SO)

Note: Displayed stat values may change

title: Confirm Batting tab only displays position players (1B, 2B, 3B, SS, C, LF, RF, CF, DH, P)
custom_expected: THEN only positions (1B, 2B, 3B, SS, C, LF, RF, CF, DH, P) are displayed

title: Confirm Pitching tab only displays pitchers (P)
custom_expected: THEN only position (P) is displayed

title: Confirm "Yankees Sortable Stats" links to desktop link on desktop
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Yankees Sortable Stats" from a desktop browser
custom_expected: THEN http://mlb.mlb.com/stats/sortable.jsp?c_id=nyy is loaded

title: Confirm "Yankees Sortable Stats" links to mobile link on mobile
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Yankees Sortable Stats" from a mobile device
custom_expected: THEN http://m.mlb.com/nyy/stats is loaded

title: Confirm existence of Team logo
custom_expected:
THEN the team's logo is displayed in the left of the footer
AND
links to https://www.mlb.com/yankees

title: Confirm "Official Info" link functionality
custom_expected: THEN "Official Info" is displayed and clicks through to http://mlb.mlb.com/mlb/official_info/index.jsp

custom_expected: THEN "Help/Contact Us" is displayed and clicks through to http://mlb.mlb.com/help/index.jsp?c_id=nyy

custom_expected: THEN "Accessibility" is displayed and clicks through to http://mlb.mlb.com/mlb/help/accessibility.jsp?c_id=nyy

custom_expected: THEN "Job Opportunities" is displayed and clicks through to http://mlb.mlb.com/mlb/help/jobs.jsp?c_id=nyy

title: Confirm "Advertising Opportunities" link functionality
custom_expected: THEN "Advertising Opportunities" is displayed and clicks through to http://mlb.mlb.com/nyy/sponsorship/index.jsp

title: Confirm MLB.com logo and clickthrough
custom_expected: THEN https://www.mlb.com/ loads

custom_expected: THEN http://mlb.mlb.com/mlb/help/contact_us.jsp is loaded
